pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Wrapper for a Svelte Custom Web Component // An interactive charting library built on 'Svelte' and 'D3' to easily produce SVG charts in R. Designed to simplify 'shiny' development by eliminating the need for renderUI(), insertUI(), removeUI(), and 'shiny' proxy functions, using 'Svelte''s reactive state system instead.
